articles.title: New Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning centre in IISc Bengaluru
articles.description: Kotak-IISc AI-ML centre will offer Bachelor's, Master's and short-term courses in areas such as artificial intelligence, machine learning, deep learning, fintech etc.
articles.content:
Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd and the Indian Institute of Science today announced a partnership to set up a state-of-the-art Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning (AI-ML) centre at the IISc campus here.

articles.title: Techies, Samsung India Has Big Hiring Plans In 2022
articles.description: Engineers, graduating in 2022, will be hired for new-age domains like artificial intelligence, machine learning, IoT, deep learning, networks and more.
articles.content: New Delhi, Nov 24: South Korean electronics major Samsung plans to hire over 1,000 engineers in India from IITs and other top engineering colleges, including BITS Pilani and NITs, in 2022. The young engineers, graduating in 2022, will be hired for ne... [1770 chars]

articles.title: Bee Partners closes fourth fund to add more capital for pre-seed founders in deep tech
articles.description: The San Francisco-based firm invests in companies focused on artificial intelligence, machine learning, robotics and frontier technologies.
articles.content:
For pre-seed founders innovating in the deep tech space, Bee Partners wants to be partners with you. It closed on $50 million in commitments for its fourth fund, which Michael Berolzheimer, managing partner, said was oversubscribed.
